hhsMinimumBatteryLevelRequiredToRelease.description: The minimum battery level required to release a handheld scanner.

hhsInactiveDaysBeforeRemoval.description: Number of days after which an inactive handheld scanner is removed. The default is set to 90 days.

enableShopperActiveHhsLimit.description: When set to true, it limits the number of active handheld scanners a shopper can have at the same time.

shopperMaximumActiveHhsAllowed.description: Number of active handheld scanners a shopper can have at the same time.

shopperMaximumActiveHhsAllowedExpiry.description: Time to live (in minutes) for shopper active handheld scanners count. This is the duration after which the count of active handheld scanners for a shopper is reset. The default is set to 1440 minutes (24 hours).
